name: cleanshare
description: Removes tracking junk from URLs when you browse, click, or copy. Privacy-first. Zero telemetry.
author: Tahir Ozcan

scripts.dev:firefox: node scripts/swap-manifest.mjs firefox && web-ext run --source-dir . --start-url https://example.com
scripts.build:firefox: node scripts/swap-manifest.mjs firefox && web-ext build --source-dir . --artifacts-dir dist --overwrite-dest
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run bump && npm run build:firefox && npm run prepare:chrome && npm run zip:edge && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run bump && npm run build:firefox && npm run prepare:chrome && npm run zip:edge && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run bump && npm run build:firefox && npm run prepare:chrome && npm run zip:edge && npm run zip:chrome
